name: Shitpost Simulator
description:
Hello, and Welcome to Shitpost Simulator,

In this game, you are given a question, and you have to answer with the dumbest possible answer. Answer ONE question wrong, and you have to go back to the start.

There are 18 levels, and a boss battle at the end in which you play as a capybara with a gun who is trying to shoot down a red sussy baka. Then you get to watch the credits screen, which also has some funny pictures.

(TLDR: This game is just 21st-century humour in a nutshell)

This game is work in progress, so I will add new levels soon, and expect bugs! If you encounter any bugs, please report them in the comments!

This game is also inspired by The Impossible Quiz and A.S.S., so if you end up liking this game (I'm sure you will) then you'll also like those too.
